 notice and the
 **Pay TransparencyNondiscrimination Provision** 
 .
   

  


***If you need assistance due to disability during the application and/or recruiting process, please contact us via the***
***Accessibility Request Form***
***.***

 Qlik is not accepting unsolicited assistance from search firms for this employment opportunity. Please, no phone calls or emails. All resumes submitted by search firms to any employee at Qlik via-email, the Internet or in any form and/or method without a valid written search agreement in place for this position will be deemed the sole property of Qlik. No fee will be paid in the event the candidate is hired by Qlik as a result of the referral or through other means.

title: Full-Stack Java Developers - Product Development IT
description:
We now recruit multiple positions for two different teams!
   

  

 Scania is currently undergoing an exciting transformation from a traditional truck manufacturer to a provider of complete sustainable transport solutions. IT is a crucial part of this transformation as Scania’s success is depending on flexible and efficient IT solutions that support current and future business requirements.
   

  

 Do you want to be a part of our journey? Great – please continue reading!
   

  

 What we do
   

  

 In Product Development IT, we develop digital tools that support the entire R&D process. Our solutions help accelerate innovation in areas like electrification, autonomous vehicles, and sustainable materials.
   

  

 We work in agile teams with end-to-end responsibility, delivering scalable, cloud-native solutions used globally.
   

  

**About The Teams**
 We’re hiring for two different teams – both working closely with R&D engineers and stakeholders.
   

  

 In a collaborative and transparent culture, you’ll work with other developers, business analysts, and product owners.
   

  

 We value knowledge-sharing, continuous learning, and curiosity.
   

  

 Your role
   

  

 You will be working as a full-stack Java developer using agile and DevOps engineering practices and be part of the full development cycle – from idea and architecture to coding, testing, deployment, and monitoring.
   

  

 Responsibilities include:
   

  

  

* Design and develop cloud-native applications in AWS.
* Work with both the frontend and backend
* Develop APIs and data flows for smart integration.
* Help improve development practices, CI/CD pipelines, and system architecture.
* We believe in taking ownership, working iteratively, and staying close to the user.


 Who you are
   

  

 We’re looking for experienced full-stack developers who:
   

  

  

* Are confident in Java and frontend frameworks like Angular.
* Have experience working in cloud environments (AWS preferred).
* Know their way around APIs, SQL/NoSQL databases, and CI/CD pipelines.
* Are curious, pragmatic, and love solving real-world problems through tech.
* It is a bonus if you also have a passion for frontend and UI/UX design


 We’re recruiting for several positions, so whether your strengths lie in backend, frontend, or somewhere along the full-stack spectrum, there’s room to tailor the role to your profile.
   

  

 As a person, you are a true team player and enjoy collaborating in an agile way of working. You are open-minded, transparent with your work, and happy to share knowledge and ideas with your colleagues. Furthermore, you are passionate about writing code and have the ability to explain complex topics in simple terms in fluent English.
   

  

 Why join us?
   

  

  

* Work in a friendly, open, and highly skilled team.
* Help shape the digital backbone of future transport.
* Freedom to explore new technologies and approaches.
* A hybrid workplace – a mix of remote and onsite in Södertälje.
* Career opportunities within a global tech organization.
* Benefits like result bonuses, pension plan, subsidized lunch, and the Scania Job Express bus from Stockholm.


 Ready to code the future?
   

  

 Then, please send in your application including a CV, answers to the application screening questions, and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.
   

  

 Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-06-09. Screening will take place on an ongoing basis during the application period. Logical and coding tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact Mikael Pihlblad, recruiting manager, at mikael.pihlblad@scania.com or Philip Axelsson Moberg, recruiting manager, at philip.axelsson.moberg@scania.com.
   

  

 We look forward to your application!

title: AI Engineer
description:
At Umain, we're not just creating software; we're crafting the future, one innovative project at a time. With our motto "Shape, Ship, Scale," we empower our team to not only envision the future but also play a pivotal role in building it. We're a dynamic team where you can shape the future, ship groundbreaking solutions, and scale your abilities in many different ways.
   

  

 We're on the lookout for developers ready to join us in this journey, bringing passion, creativity, and dedication along with them. The role is ideal for engineers with demonstrable skills in AI as well as for software engineers who have recently transitioned to AI and ML expertise, and offers an opportunity to develop your craft whilst working closely with clients on delivering AI solutions to real-world challenges.
   

  

**Job Summary**
 We are seeking an AI Engineer with a strong intuition for AI and a genuine enthusiasm in building robust, scalable solutions to power innovative digital experiences. The ideal candidate combines technical expertise with a deep enthusiasm for advancing AI capabilities.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* A chance to work closely with global brands on a range of diverse and unique projects that explore and truly push the boundaries of what's possible.
* A fun and fair work environment where you have the opportunity to expand your skills through unique challenges and fantastic colleagues.
* A personal coach, and a setting where you can grow professionally and personally.
* Being part of multidisciplinary teams, participating in agile teams, being an important player in a highly ambitious setting.


 As an AI Engineer at Umain, your role will involve:
   

  

* Assisting our clients in clarifying their questions and determining if using AI is a suitable solution for them
* You understand the limitations of a model and how to address them within the product’s UX
* Implementing AI-as-a-Service (e.g., OpenAI, Claude LLMs) in projects; you assess when these services are a good option and understand any potential limitations
* Being familiar with pre-trained models and available datasets and the ability to apply them if existing AI services fall short for the use case at hand
* Validating, deploying, monitoring, and maintaining built models, ensuring they can be used at scale
* Developing and maintaining end-to-end data pipelines and machine learning workflows, optimizing for performance and reliability
* Working with diverse, cross-functional teams on projects that deliver groundbreaking AI solutions for global brands


 It’s a plus (not a requirement) if you have additional experience in:
   

  

* PyTorch, Tensorflow
* Transfer learning, few-shot learning, PEFT and LoRa
* Multi-modal transformer models, RLHF


 Who You Are
   

  

**We Value Candidates Who Demonstrate**
* Great delivery skills: Proven capability to deliver AI solutions
* Strong AI intuition: A deep understanding of AI concepts
* Curiosity: Enthusiasm for emerging technologies, creativity in problem-solving, and an eagerness to learn in a rapidly evolving AI landscape
* You're a developer with a passion for innovation and a knack for problem-solving.
* You're eager to learn, grow, and take on new challenges.
* You value collaboration, diversity, and the opportunity to make a significant impact.
* You believe in the power of technology to shape the future.


**Why Umain?**
**Career Framework** 
 : We believe in fairness and clarity, which is why we've established a transparent career framework to ensure equal pay and equal opportunities for all. Your growth and success are as important to us as they are to you. Together with your coach, you will build your own development plan and grow in your career.
   

  

**Work-Life Balance** 
 : At Umain, diversity is our strength. We understand that life doesn’t pause when you walk into the office. That's why we've cultivated an environment that supports an excellent work-life balance. We welcome team members from all walks of life, recognizing the richness that different backgrounds, ages, and life stages bring to our team. We're committed to supporting each other, encouraging a healthy work-life balance that respects your needs, whether it's taking care of your family, your pets, or yourself.
   

  

**Innovations and Learning** 
 : Technology is always evolving, bringing new challenges and opportunities for collaboration and learning. Our developers work closely with designers, analysts, testers and more to tackle these challenges head-on, sharing knowledge and growing together.
   

  

**Skills Over Degrees** 
 : We’re more interested in what you can do than in the diplomas you hold. Talent, drive, and creativity are what count at Umain. Here, you’ll find opportunities to grow, learn, and excel in your career, regardless of your educational background. If you have the ambition and commitment to succeed, we have the environment and resources to support your journey.
   

  

 Are you ready to SHAPE, SHIP, and SCALE with us?
   

  

 If you're a developer who thrives on innovation, values a supportive and inclusive workplace, and is eager to make a tangible impact on the future, we’d love to hear from you. Let’s build something awesome together.
   

  

 Umain is a digital product consultancy. We shape, ship and scale digital products at speed. Founded in Stockholm in 2001, we are a growing team of 100+ experts in digital product strategy, design, and technology.
   

  

 We are a part of Eidra, a group of top-notch companies specializing in strategy, creativity, and engineering. As a collective we guide leaders in making meaningful and lasting change.

title: Senior Staff Software Engineer
company_industry: Software Development, Financial Services, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**The Company**
 PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
   

  

 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
   

  

 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
   

  

 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
   

  

**Job Description Summary:**
 This role offers an exciting and unique opportunity to tackle cutting-edge technical and business challenges alongside talented peers in a cross-functional Agile team. By joining PayPal, you’ll have the chance to create modern digital products that positively impact people's lives and contribute to the success of millions of merchants worldwide.
   

  

**Job Description:**
**Your way to Impact**
 In this role you will get the opportunity to work with skilled and highly motivated Engineers (Backend, iOS, Android and QA) to deliver a world class experience for our users. You will tap into their years of delivery experience to turbo boost your learning so that you can help deliver exciting features and improvements to the Payment/Orders experience serving customers at scale and across multiple Geolocations.
   

  

**Your day to day**
* You will focus on your learning while helping to deliver high quality solutions to our users.
* You will work as part of an agile team, planning, refining, delivering and inspecting sprint deliveries.
* You work closely with product and design to understand context and vision.
* You will learn and work with your peers in the Backend chapter to make incremental platform improvements and increase learning opportunities for all in a supportive environment.


**What Do You Need To Succeed**
* You love being a Backend Engineer and bring that enthusiasm.
* You have strong understanding of Kotlin/Java programming languages for Backend development.
* You are familiar with Spring or DropWizard.
* You have experience in cloud services, particularly AWS.
* You have a proven experience working with data stores (i.e relational databases).
* You master Git and GitHub for version control and collaboration.
* You have a solid understanding of RESTful APIs.
* You have a desire to learn and improve your skills.
* You bring curiosity and energy to your work.
* You bring a desire to create fantastic outcomes for users.
* You are at ease sharing your knowledge, experience and opinions, but also appreciate input from your peers.
* You will bring your desire to innovate during lab days and hack weeks.


 For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.
   

  

**Our Benefits:**
 At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset—you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.
   

  

 We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com
   

  

**Who We Are:**
 To learn more about our culture and community visit https://about.pypl.com/who-we-are/default.aspx
   

  

**Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com.
   

  

**Belonging at PayPal:**
 Our employees are central to advancing our mission, and we strive to create an environment where everyone can do their best work with a sense of purpose and belonging. Belonging at PayPal means creating a workplace with a sense of acceptance and security where all employees feel included and valued. We are proud to have a diverse workforce reflective of the merchants, consumers, and communities that we serve, and we continue to take tangible actions to cultivate inclusivity and belonging at PayPal.
   

  

 Any general requests for consideration of your skills, please Join our Talent Community.
   

  

 We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don’t hesitate to apply.
   

  

 REQ ID R0125362

title: .NET Developer CRM
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Business Consulting and Services
description:
**Jobbeskrivning**
**Utvecklare på Sopra Steria – skapa framtidens lösningar med oss!**
 Hos oss på Sopra Steria arbetar du med alla delar av utvecklingsprocessen, från koncept till implementation och förvaltning. Du får bryta ner komplexa problem och skapa anpassade lösningar till kunder med den allra senaste tekniken, med grund i Microsofts hela portfölj av tjänster. Som utvecklare i .NET rör vi oss över hela stacken, vilket gör att arbetsuppgifterna under en vecka kan variera. Att arbeta med Microsofts paraply av molntjänster, som dessutom ständigt utökas, gör att du kan bli specialist inom ditt kompetensområde, men ändå alltid ha mer att lära.
   

  

 Arbetsuppgifterna som utvecklare hos oss kan t.ex. innebära att:
   

  

* Anpassa funktionaliteten i Dynamics CRM genom utveckling av tillägg i C# och klientanpassningar i JavaScript/TypeScript
* Skapa .NET Core-applikationer för att integrera till och från Dynamics CRM
* Skapa low code-lösningar baserat på Power Apps och Power Automate
* Skapa förutsägbara och stabila releaser med verktyg som Azure DevOps, TeamCity, Octopus Deploy m.fl.


**Om dig**
* 3 års erfarenhet som utvecklare backend, C# .NET
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Power Apps, Power Automate, Dataverse, Azure eller andra kringliggande tjänster inom området
* God kommunikativ förmåga i svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift


**Varför välja Sopra Steria**
* Fokus på kompetensutveckling och din personliga utveckling - vi kallar det för Power of sharing
* Stark företagskultur - utsedda till Sveriges bästa arbetsplats av Great Place to Work
* Många teamleveranser!


**Ansök nu – vi ser fram emot att träffa dig!**
 Vi behandlar ansökningar och kallar till intervju löpande. På Sopra Steria ställer vi höga krav på både kompetens och säkerhetsmedvetenhet hos våra medarbetare. Innan en eventuell anställning kommer du därför att genomgå en bakgrundskontroll, och vid intervju behöver du kunna uppvisa giltig legitimation.
   

  

 Rekryteringsprocessen består av tre intervjuer, ett logiskt test, referenstagning och bakgrundskontroll. Denna kombination av urvalsmetoder ger oss en bredare och mer rättvis bild av dig som kandidat, samtidigt som det säkerställer att både dina tekniska och personliga styrkor kommer till sin rätt. För dig som kandidat innebär det en möjlighet att visa din kompetens och potential från flera perspektiv.
   

  

 Om du har frågor om tjänsten eller oss som bolag är du välkommen att kontakta Kalle Forsell, kalle.forsell@soprasteria.com
   

  

**Ytterligare information**
 Sopra Steria är ett ledande internationellt konsultbolag inom digital transformation. Vi bygger samhället genom designdriven innovation, teknisk utveckling med kunskap om marknadens ledande plattformar och driftlösningar (managed services). Med modern teknologi och en gedigen affärsförståelse är vi en helhetspartner för våra kunder och deras digitala transformationsresa. Enligt Great Place To Work är vi en av Sveriges bästa arbetsplatser, vi har tilldelats utmärkelsen Karriärföretag flera år i rad och Gartner har listat oss som ett topp 5 bolag inom digital transformation.

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
**💼 Senior Frontend Developer – Greenfield Fintech Platform | Hybrid in Stockholm** 




  





 🚀 I’m partnering with a
 **leading Nordic digital finance company** 
 that’s launching a
 **greenfield customer platform** 
 and growing their product development hub in
 **central Stockholm** 
 . They’re now looking for a
 **Senior Frontend Engineer** 
 with
 **5+ years of professional React experience** 
 to take a key role in this transformation.
 



  





 This is a rare opportunity to work on a
 **modern, clean-slate build** 
 —not legacy cleanup.
 



  





**🧠 The Opportunity** 




 You’ll be joining a new product team responsible for building intuitive, responsive self-service tools for thousands of users across the Nordic region. This isn’t just feature work—it’s a chance to help shape
 **architecture, tooling, and user experience** 
 from day one.
 



  





**✅ What They’re Looking For** 



* **5+ years** 
 building production-grade React applications
* Strong skills with
 **React** 
 and
 **TypeScript**
* Experience with tools like React Query, Material UI, and Firebase Analytics
* Proficient with
 **GitHub Actions** 
 , Docker, and modern CI/CD pipelines
* A product mindset—you care about the “why” behind what you build
* Someone who thrives in a
 **hybrid** 
 setup (2–3 days/week in Stockholm office)



  





**🔍 Bonus Points If You Have** 



* Worked in greenfield/product-focused environments
* Knowledge of TDD, DDD, SOLID principles
* Experience in regulated domains like fintech or healthtech



  





**🌟 Why This Role?** 



* **Greenfield development** 
 – fresh architecture, clean codebase
* Clear ownership over frontend direction
* Hybrid setup with a welcoming Stockholm-based team
* Inclusive, product-first culture with long-term tech investment
* A real chance to shape something from the ground up



  





 📌
 *Final candidates will complete a standard background check via a secure third-party process.*

title: Senior .NET Developer
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

****Din profil (Skall krav)****
* Du har gedigen erfarenhet av .NET (Core och Framework).
* Du har erfarenhet av både SQL- och NoSQL-/dokumentdatabaser.
* Du har kunskap inom asynkron och eventdriven arkitektur, särskilt meddelandebaserad kommunikation via exempelvis Azure Service Bus eller Enterprise Service Bus.
* Du har god förståelse för webbkommunikation – från nätverkslager till klientsidan, inklusive HTTP, TLS, OAuth 2.0/OpenID Connect och lastbalansering.
* Du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med ett säkerhetsperspektiv i utvecklingen.
* Du har tidigare arbetat med containrar (t.ex. Docker) och molnbaserade lösningar i Azure.
* Du har vana vid microservice-arkitektur och versionshantering i Git.
* Du har erfarenhet av CI/CD och DevOps-relaterade arbetsuppgifter, inklusive script-baserad automatisering.


**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 20-05-2025
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.
   

  

 Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?
   

  

 Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.

title: Backend Developer
description:
**Why Dashy?** 




 We believe in creating meaningful and memorable digital experiences that leave lasting impressions. As a consultant at Dashy, you will get the opportunity to work with some of the most inspiring digital entertainment companies in the world, within fields such as games, music, and other forms of interactive media. We strive to work with clients that build products and services that they, and we, can be truly proud of.
 



  





 At Dashy our people are always in the center - together we build and grow the company with happiness as our guiding principle. We enable growth and personal development, with collaboration and knowledge-sharing as an integral part in everything we do.
 



  





**As a Backend Developer at Dashy:** 



* Dive deep into the world of digital entertainment, designing, developing and iterating on systems and features.
* Collaborate with a vibrant cross-functional team, including developers, designers, producers, product managers, and more.
* Support other colleagues in their growth and with their challenges.
* Help build and grow Dashy.



  





**We're looking for:** 



* 3-5 years of experience as a Backend Developer.
* Strong experience with backend services using Java/Spring, C#/.NET, or JavaScript/TypeScript (NestJS, Express).
* Solid understanding of database systems, data modeling, and query optimization.
* Proficient in designing and implementing RESTful APIs and/or RPC APIs.
* Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud), including serverless architectures, IAM, and cloud databases.
* Familiarity with containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and microservices architecture.
* Knowledge of common engineering practices such as CI/CD pipelines, version control (Git), and automated testing.
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in a collaborative team environment.
* A degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent experience.
* Passion for continuous learning and mentoring others.
* Genuine interest in games, music, and interactive media.



  





 Nurture your passion for technology and entertainment, and turn it into a fulfilling career with us at Dashy Studios!

title: Senior Frontend Developer till Hubexo
description:
Hubexo befinner sig på en spännande tillväxtresa där vi ständigt utvecklas för att förbli både kunders och medarbetares självklara val i branschen. Vi är ambitiösa i allt vi åtar oss och expanderar kontinuerligt till nya regioner och segment för att stärka vår position som det ledande mjukvaru- och informationsföretaget inom bygg, fastighet och sjukvård. Koncernen omsätter cirka 2 miljarder SEK och har över 2 000 anställda i 26 olika länder.
   

  

 Läs mer om oss här: About - Hubexo
   

  

**Om Rollen**
 Vi söker en
 **Senior Frontend Developer** 
 till vårt Platforms team, som ansvarar för att bygga och underhålla den tekniska grunden som våra produktteam bygger vidare på. Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i att utveckla gemensamma komponenter, designsystem, autentisering och andra viktiga plattformsfunktioner som används i hela vår produktportfölj.
   

  

 Du jobbar nära både produktutveckling och design, och samarbetar med andra team för att skapa enhetliga, prestandaoptimerade och hållbara lösningar. Rollen rapporterar till Team Lead för Platforms teamet och utgår från vårt kontor i Stockholm.
   

  

**Som Senior Frontend Developer Kommer Du Att**
* Utveckla och underhålla gemensamma komponentbibliotek och interna verktyg i vår frontend-stack.
* Vara drivande i implementationen av vårt designsystem och se till att det tillämpas konsekvent.
* Delta i tekniska vägval kring ramverk, arkitektur och prestandaoptimering.
* Arbeta nära UX-designers, backendutvecklare och andra frontendutvecklare för att säkerställa en sömlös användarupplevelse.
* Bidra till våra interna standarder och bästa praxis för kodkvalitet, testning och tillgänglighet.
* Mentorskap – stötta andra utvecklare och vara en förebild inom frontendområdet.


**Vår Teknikstack**
* Frontend ramverk: React.
* Språk: TypeScript.
* Cloud: AWS.


**Om Dig**
* Du har 5+ års erfarenhet av modern frontendutveckling med fokus på React och TypeScript.
* Du har en känsla för detaljer inom UX/UI och brinner för att skapa eleganta, tillgängliga och snabba gränssnitt.
* Du har erfarenhet av att arbeta med designsystem och komponentbibliotek i större applikationer.
* Du är van att samarbeta över teamgränser och trivs i miljöer där tekniska beslut fattas gemensamt.
* Du är van att jobba med kodgranskning, testning och CI/CD-processer.
* Du är självgående, strukturerad och uppskattar balans mellan kvalitet och leverans.
* Du kommunicerar obehindrat på både svenska och engelska.


 Som person är du lösnings orienterad och trivs med att ta eget ansvar samtidigt som du har lätt för att samarbeta i team. Du är analytisk och strukturerad, vilket gör att du snabbt kan sätta dig in i komplexa tekniska utmaningar och hitta effektiva, långsiktiga lösningar.
   

  

 Ditt pedagogiska sätt gör att du kan kommunicera tekniska koncept på ett sätt som är lättförståeligt för både tekniska och icke-tekniska målgrupper, vilket gör dig till en uppskattad samarbetspartner. Din nyfikenhet och vilja att utvecklas driver dig att hålla dig uppdaterad inom det senaste inom teknikområdet, vilket bidrar till att skapa värde för verksamheten.
   

  

**Vad kan vi erbjuda dig?**
 Om du har passion för det du gör, är engagerad i dina åtaganden, uthållig och pålitlig kommer vi att göra allt vi kan för att skapa rätt förutsättningar för att du ska få en lång och rolig karriär hos oss.
   

  

**Utöver Det Erbjuder Vi**
* Konkurrenskraftig lön
* Tjänstepension (ITP1)
* 30 dagars semester

title: Utvecklare till Sweco!
description:
*Är du en utvecklare med några års erfarenhet som vill ta nästa steg i karriären? Vill du arbeta i en dynamisk miljö där du får samarbeta med många olika delar av verksamheten? Då kan rollen som utvecklare hos Sweco vara perfekt för dig!*
**Din Vardag**
 Som utvecklare på Sweco blir du en del av teamet Masterdata & Integration inom IT Operations – ett agilt team på 10 personer som stöttar hela organisationen med data, integrationer och API-baserade lösningar.
   

  

 Som utvecklare kommer ditt huvudsakliga fokus vara att utveckla integrationer mellan Swecos integrationshub och olika applikationer, hostade i Swecos nätverk eller moln. Dessa integrationer hanterar förändringar i databaser och säkerställer att informationen speglas korrekt i berörda system.
   

  

 Du kommer främst att arbeta med C# .NET programmering, men kommer även få använda dig av verktyg som SSIS, Azure Data Factory (ADF) och PowerShell. Som utvecklare i Masterdata & Integration kommer du också få en djupare förståelse för Swecos databasstruktur.
   

  

 Ibland kommer det vara uppgifter som är kopplade till ett kortare tidsspann, men du kommer även vara en del av projekt som löper över en längre period där du kommer få samarbeta med andra avdelningar inom IT organisationen.
   

  

**Vem är du?**
 För att lyckas i rollen som utvecklare tror vi att du har:
   

  

* Erfarenhet av att C#, .NET.
* Erfarenhet av SQL
* Tidigare jobbat med att implementera API:er
* Erfarenhet av Azure plattformen
* Erfarenhet av Visual Studio
* Flytande svenska tal och skrift


 Det är ett plus om du tidigare har jobbat med eventdrivna lösningar samt Kubernetes.
   

  

 Som person tror vi att du är social och har en stark kommunikativ förmåga, du tycker om att samarbeta med andra och är duktig på organisering och struktur. Vidare besitter du ett starkt logiskt tänk och är lösningsorienterad.
   

  

**Hur du ansöker**
 I den här rekryteringen samarbetar Sweco med Wise IT. Vill du veta mer om jobbet, kontakta ansvarig rekryteringskonsult, Gustaf Linder, gustaf.linder@wiseit.se . Wise IT kan tyvärr inte ta emot ansökningar via mail, då vi värnar om din personliga integritet. Du kan läsa mer om hur vi behandlar personuppgifter enligt GDPR i Wise Group-koncernens policy för behandling av personuppgifter.
   

  

 Urval sker löpande. Välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

**Passar vi dig?**
 Transforming society together, we’re planning and designing sustainable communities and cities of the future.
   

  

 Solving the great societal challenges of our time is more relevant, demanding and inspiring than ever before. At Sweco, we bring together experts with different perspectives and skills to develop solutions that address the challenges of urbanisation, harness the positive power of digitalisation and make societies more sustainable.
   

  

 We offer our clients a combination of global expertise and local presence, adapted to their business and reality. Our ambition is to be our clients’ most relevant partner, working together to help them solve their challenges, today and into the future.
   

  

 Sweco is committed to enabling all its colleagues to achieve a great balance between work and their other priorities, such as caring responsibilities, leisure activities, further learning or other interests. We offer flexible start and finish times, part time and hybrid working options so that you can flex your hours around your day to day needs.

title: Senior Java developer
description:
**Är du en erfaren Javautvecklare som söker nya utmaningar?**
 Hos B3 Innovation får du möjligheten att arbeta i en miljö där innovation och samarbete står i fokus. Vi söker dig med djup kunskap inom Java och som trivs i en dynamisk och inkluderande arbetsmiljö.
   

  

**Om rollen som Javautvecklare på B3 Innovation**
 Som utvecklare hos oss kommer du att:
   

  

* Utveckla högkvalitativa och skalbara lösningar.
* Samarbeta med ett tvärfunktionellt team av experter.
* Delta i design och arkitektur av nya system.


**Om dig**
 Vi söker dig som har god erfarenhet och arbetat som utvecklare under en längre tid. Du som har hunnit både göra misstag och även lära av dem. Förhoppningsvis tycker du om att arbeta i team, dela med dig av dina kunskaper och vill fortsätta att lära dig nytt.
   

  

 Våra krav för att du ska passa i denna roll:
   

  

* Du behärskar svenska i tal och skrift.
* Du har minst 5 års erfarenhet av Javautveckling.
* Du har god kunskap att jobba med Java, Kotlin, Spring, Microservices (gärna i CI/CD-miljö)
* Du har god kunskap att jobba med olika ramverk som React, Angular och Vue.
* Du har ett öga för detaljer och brinner för att leverera kvalitativa lösningar.
* Du är bekväm med moderna utvecklingsmetoder som Agile och DevOps.
* Har du dessutom kunskaper inom Techlead blir vi extra glada!


 Varför B3 Innovation?
   

  

* Innovativ Kultur: Vi uppmuntrar kreativitet och nya idéer.
* Inkluderande miljö: Vi värdesätter mångfald och strävar efter en arbetsplats där alla känner sig välkomna.
* Balans och flexibilitet: Flexibilitet är centralt, vilket gör att du kan forma din arbetsdag för att få livspusslet att gå ihop. Vi förstår vikten av balans mellan arbete och fritid och erbjuder därför flexibla arbetstider.
* Gemenskap: Hos oss blir du en del av ett stöttande team som arbetar tillsammans för att nå gemensamma mål. Det handlar inte bara om “jobb jobb jobb” hos oss. Vi anordnar allt från tech-workshops till sociala aktiviteter som stickcaféer, spelkvällar och AW.


**Om B3 Innovation**
 Vi är kända för vårt fokus på innovation och förmåga att leverera värde till våra kunder. Genom att kombinera djup teknisk expertis med en stark förståelse för våra kunders verksamhet, skapar vi lösningar som verkligen gör skillnad. Vår kultur bygger på öppenhet, samarbete och en passion för teknik.
   

  

 Vi prioriterar personlig utveckling och erbjuder verktyg som B3 Academy, TechTalks och "Lunch & Learn" för att du ska kunna växa.
   

  

 Upptäck möjligheterna med B3 Innovation. Som utvecklare får du arbeta inom spännande branscher som media, bank och finans, energi, offentlig sektor, telekom och e-handel. Oavsett om du optimerar TV-sändningar, utvecklar digitala banktjänster eller skapar smarta hem, hjälper vi dig att hitta det perfekta uppdraget som matchar dina intressen.
   

  

 Våra toppbetyg i medarbetarundersökningar visar att nöjda kollegor är kärnan i vår framgång. Är du redo att kliva in i en miljö där utveckling och trivsel går hand i hand?
   

  

 Som sagt, välkommen till B3 Innovation – vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
   

  

**Är du redo att ta nästa steg?**
 Skicka in din ansökan idag och bli en del av vårt engagerade och innovativa team!
   

  

 Om du är mer nyfiken på oss så kan du läsa mer om oss här: https://www.b3.se/innovation
   

  

 Om du har funderingar så hör gärna av dig till Kenneth Andersson på +46706678050 alternativt mail kenneth.andersson@b3.se

title: Senior Fullstack Developer - Pension product
description:
**Sambla Group is a fast-growing fintech company with the clear goal of empowering customers to improve their personal finances and provide them with the best consumer finance products in the industry. Backed by a winning mindset and over 350 colleagues in 4 countries, we have successfully helped more than 1 million customers improve their financial situation by consolidating their personal loans and helping them seek better terms.**
 Now, we need you, your ambition and your skills to join us in an exciting opportunity as we launch a brand-new pension advisory service at Sambla Group. You will be joining a team of experts, building a customer-facing product at an early stage of development and making a strong impact on the product and customer experience.
   

  

 What we offer you
   

  

 You will be part of a vertically integrated product team including business development, sales & advisory and design. We need you who enjoys being engaged in the product development process and actively participating in discovery and prioritisation with an ability to balance delivery speed versus technical necessities.
   

  

 We are looking for a skilled and well-rounded senior developer, who is curious about learning new technologies, comfortable researching and implementing sound and scalable technological choices and solutions, and vocal in brainstorming sessions to effectively contribute to the best possible outcome. We specifically appreciate a tinkering and enquiring mindset, willing to experiment with solutions on a small scale as a way to unpack a problem.
   

  

 We expect you to not shy away from interacting with the full team and asking extensive questions as part of the discovery process. We are keen to look into any public repositories you may want to share on your Github.
   

  

 Our primary languages are TypeScript and JavaScript, with Node.js powering our backend, and React (JS/TS) for our frontend framework.
   

  

 Our system consists of AWS lambda services in a serverless architecture defined by AWS CDK stacks that utilize multiple serverless services in the AWS infrastructure. The system is powered by a Neptune graph database.
   

  

 As a department, we continuously strive to enhance our skillsets, tools, and working environment. Parts of achieving this is through our architecture forum and a strong focus on developer experience.
   

  

 Key Responsibilities
   

  

* Collaborate with a cross-functional team to design, develop, and implement the platform for the new product.
* Participate in all phases of the product development lifecycle, from concept to deployment.
* Write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
* Troubleshoot, test, and maintain the system to ensure good product fit and technical excellence.
* Contribute to the continuous improvement of the product by actively seeking feedback and providing innovative solutions.
* Participate in creating efficient development processes in a team that is starting from scratch.
* Engage in highly mission driven sessions on a daily basis to facilitate rapid development.


**Qualifications**
* Proven track record as a developer with a minimum of 5 years of relevant experience, preferably with full stack responsibility and high shipping frequency
* Relevant Computer Science or Engineering Education at least at BA level.
* Solid understanding of software development principles and methodologies
* Ability to work effectively in a collaborative, fast-paced environment.
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.


 We value experience or familiarity with our chosen technologies such as Node.js, React, graph databases, Docker, AWS and microservice architecture, but for the right candidate who has shown curiosity in different technologies and architectures, we will provide the necessary learning environment to quickly get up to speed with our stack and ways of working.
   

  

 What you will get
   

  

* Work directly with a senior developer with extensive domain knowledge, gaining valuable insights and mentorship.
* Be part of a highly motivated and innovative team dedicated to creating the next product offering for Sambla Group.
* Opportunity to make a significant impact on the development and success of a new product.
* Engage in a Skunk Works style setting where we do things together to foster creativity, collaboration, and rapid problem-solving.


 We are looking forward to receiving your application!
   

  

**Please note!**
 As part of our efforts to foster an unbiased recruitment process, we kindly encourage you to not include picture, gender, ethnicity, religion, disability, sexual orientation or age in your CV.
   

  

 Sambla Group is the new generation of brokers. Our ambition has always been the same - to challenge the banks’ offers so that our customers, regardless of the conditions, should always have the same opportunity to obtain the best possible loan solution. Sambla Group has grown to over 350 employees, established itself in Sweden, Norway, Finland and Denmark with offices in Sweden, Finland and Denmark.

title: ServiceNow Developer
description:
Our Client seeks a
 **ServiceNow Developer** 
 to fulfill a
 **6 months + extensions** 
**onsite** 
 position in
 **Stockholm, Sweden** 
 , starting on
 **2nd June 2025** 
 . We are looking for a
 **Senior ServiceNow developer** 
 to help manage and develop the ServiceNow platform. In this role, you will collaborate closely with a dedicated team to enhance the platform's functionality, ensuring alignment with
 **ServiceNow Best Practices** 
 .
 



  





 Your responsibilities will include understanding business requirements, providing insightful solution/design suggestions, and ensuring the platform's manageability. You will work in tandem with process and application owners to conduct analysis, design, and solution development, while also troubleshooting incidents and performing administrative tasks.
 



  





 The ideal candidate will possess at least
 **5-8 years of experience** 
 in the development and management of the ServiceNow platform, with a strong grasp of
 *SaaS platform architecture* 
 and traditional IT infrastructure. Proficiency in both
 **English** 
 and
 **Swedish** 
 is preferred, as well as familiarity with
 **ITIL** 
 and
 **SAFe** 
 frameworks. Your ability to communicate effectively and document processes will be key to your success.
 



  




* **Collaborate with the ServiceNow team** 
 to enhance platform functionality.
* **Analyze business requirements** 
 and propose innovative solutions.
* **Ensure compliance with ServiceNow Best Practices** 
 throughout development.
* **Document configurations and customizations** 
 for future reference.
* **Assist in troubleshooting** 
 and resolving incidents promptly.
* **Maintain an understanding of the licensing model** 
 to maximize platform value.
* **Foster effective communication** 
 with stakeholders in both English and Swedish.

title: Senior AI Agent Platform Developer
description:
We're looking for a Senior AI Agent Platform Developer who enjoys creating robust and scalable software while collaborating with customers to further develop our platform.
 



 You'll work with technologies like NodeJs, TypeScript, React/Next.js, and MongoDB while exploring the latest AI-assisted development tools.
 



**Key Qualifications:** 




 Strong full-stack development experience
 



 Platform technology & architecture expertise
 



 Customer collaboration skills
 



 Interest in Generative AI technologies
 



  





 We're a diverse team growing in a rapidly changing and dynamic environment. Do join us! Learn more at ymnig.ai/careers

title: Backend Developer - Ruby
description:
**At Hemnet, Sweden’s #1 property portal, we’re continuing to grow and evolving our architecture to support more scalable and flexible solutions. That means keeping what works — like Ruby — while thoughtfully introducing new technologies where they add real value.** 
  

  

 We’re now strengthening our organization and are looking for developers who are confident working with Ruby and open to contributing to our journey towards a more balanced tech stack.
   

  

 This is a role for someone who enjoys solving real problems, wants to work in a modern development team, and takes pride in writing well-structured, maintainable code that delivers clear value.
   

  

**What You’ll Do** 
  

  

* Contribute to the development of new features and the improvement of existing ones
* Collaborate closely with product managers, designers, and other developers to shape our products
* Take part in architectural and technical discussions and decisions
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code — and review others’ code with care
* Support and maintain production systems, ensuring stability and performance
* Work in pairs or mobs to learn together and improve quality
* Help plan the team’s work, clarify and prioritize the backlog, and break down goals into actionable steps


  

  

**What We’re Looking For** 
  

  

* Solid experience with Ruby (or another similar language)
* Experience working with RESTful APIs
* Knowledge of software design principles, automated testing, and CI/CD
* Familiarity with PostgreSQL and cloud infrastructure (AWS, Docker, CircleCI)
* You understand the importance of performance, code quality, and team collaboration
* You’re used to working in agile environments with cross-functional teams


  

  

**Bonus If You Have** 
  

  

* Experience with Node.js, NestJS, or modern JavaScript (ES6+)
* Knowledge of GraphQL and experience building or using APIs in that format.


  

  

 We don’t expect you to know everything on day one — but we do expect you to be curious, open, and willing to grow alongside us.
   

  

**Our Tech Stack** 
  

  

 Ruby
   

  

* Node.js
* Go
* Nest
* Next
* React
* GraphQL
* CircleCI
* GitHub
* PostgreSQL
* AWS
* Datadog
* Sentry


  

  

**🏡 Your career at Hemnet** 
  

  

 With over 40 million visits each month, you’ll be part of Sweden’s most popular property platform – and one of the world’s most admired real estate platforms. But our size and reputation aren’t the only reasons why you and your 150+ colleagues enjoy working here.
   

  

 Since 1998, Hemnet has been an essential go-to place for millions of Swedes, guiding them through one of life’s biggest transitions: finding a new place to call home. We’re proud to make this life-changing, often stressful journey as seamless as possible.
   

  

 With access to vast amounts of data, you’ll have limitless opportunities to explore and create new features that enhance the experience for Sweden’s real estate agents, home buyers, and sellers.
   

  

 Our friendly Hemnet culture fosters a dynamic, playful environment where every voice is valued. Here, you’ll join a welcoming team that encourages you to thrive and grow, working alongside passionate colleagues from around the world.
   

  

**A Hybrid Way of Working** 
  

  

 Our vibrant office in central Stockholm is the hub of our collaboration and culture, providing a lively space that fosters team spirit. We come together in the office three days a week, with two flexible remote days. To be part of our team, it’s essential to be based in or near Stockholm.

title: Business Developer
description:
Intric is accelerating its growth, driven by a fresh round of funding from investors and strong demand from both existing and new customers.
 



  





 Our platform - Intric.ai - is currently transforming how work is done, primarily within the public sector and companies that value data sovereignty, by making the power of AI accessible to a wider audience. We have secured a market-leading position in a niche of this segment.
 



  





 We are seeking a motivated individual eager to embark on the journey of a lifetime with our expanding and driven team.
 



  





**Your role** 




 As a Business Developer you are at the core of the sales team, helping accelerating our growth by expanding the use of our platform to new customers.
 



  





**Who you are** 



* Passionate about business development and interested in AI
* Solution-oriented with an entrepreneurial spirit who gets things done
* Enjoy working in a fast-paced, agile environment
* We think you have 1-2 years of experience in similar roles or demonstrable achievements in relevant areas. Experience with a startup is considered extra relevant.
* Fluent in Swedish, social, driven, and eager to learn new things
* Proficiency in especially Norwegian or German, but other European languages as well is considered a strong plus (not a requirement but highly valued).



  





**Key responsibilities** 




 As a part of our sales team, one of your primary responsibilities is to bring our revolutionary product to both new and existing markets. This will include executing activities such as:
 



  




* Talking to potential customers and understand their needs
* Negotiating and closing deals
* Sourcing and initiating potential partnership opportunities
* Do what it takes to hit targets and deadlines, which might include proactive demand generation and finding creative ways to build the sales pipeline



  





**What we offer** 



* An opportunity to be a part of building a system and company that defines the future
* Rapid career development in an exciting, fast-moving sector
* Competitive compensation package combining salary and stock options

title: rollout manager
description:
Job Title: Technical Rollout Manager
 



 Job Type: Permanent
 



 Location: Stockholm, Sweden
 



  





**Requirements** 
 :
 


* Dynamics technical design and development experience (X++, C#, SSRS and BI development)
* Minimum of 3-4 MS full life cycle Dynamics 365 F&O implementations projects in a role of a Developer, Technical consultants or Technical Architect, experience with Visual Studio and in .NET development
* Experience in upgrading to the latest releases of Dynamics 365 (code and data upgrade).
* Testing Using RSAT.
* Experience in complex data migration (using DIXF, third party tools, Atlas and custom development
* Experience in performance optimization (X++ application code, troubleshooting D365 components, AXPerf, LCS Environment monitoring, SQL performance optimization)
* Experience in environment and release management (ALM, TFS, Build processes, Environment management, Installation and configuration of AX and related components)
* Should have done at least 3 successful implementations.
